content: The agency responsible for regulating magic in this society could be called the "Magical Authority" or "Magical Regulation Bureau" (MRB). Another possible name could be "Resonant Control and Enforcement Agency" (RCEA) or "Resonant Law Enforcement Bureau" (RLEB) which emphasizes the focus on enforcing the laws of resonance and maintaining control over the use of magic. Another option could be "Magical Oversight Council" (MOC) which emphasizes the council's role in overseeing and guiding the use of magic. Another option could be "Magical Guild" or "Magical Guild Council" (MGC) which emphasizes the guild-like nature of the organization, with a focus on training and certifying individuals in the use of magic.
